  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101526</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Keeling Curve Turns 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Keeling Kurve Dreht 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Courbe de Keeling Tourne 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Curva De Keeling Gira 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Curva Di Keeling Gira 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καμπύλη Keeling γυρίζει 50</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Curva De Keeling Da vuelta A 50</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The inception of the "Keeling Curve," a history of atmospheric carbon dioxide levels, marked a key moment in American science history. The record began in March, 1958 at a small observatory on the top of Hawaii's Mauna Loa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gründung der "Keeling Kurve," eine Geschichte
der atmosphärischen Kohlendioxydstufen, kennzeichnete einen 
Schlüsselmoment in der amerikanischen Wissenschaft Geschichte. 
Der Satz fing im März, 1958 an einer kleinen Sternwarte auf die
Oberseite von Mauna Loa Hawaiis an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le commencement de la "courbe de Keeling," une 
histoire des niveaux atmosphériques d'anhydride carbonique, a marqué
un moment principal dans l'histoire américaine de la science. 
L'enregistrement a commencé en mars, 1958 à un petit 
observatoire sur le dessus de Mauna Loa d'Hawaï.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O inception de "da curva Keeling," um history de 
níveis atmosféricos do dióxido de carbono, marcou um momento chave 
no history americano da ciência. O registro começou em março,
1958 em um obervatório pequeno no alto de Mauna Loa de Havaí.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'inizio "della curva di Keeling," una storia dei 
livelli atmosferici dell'anidride carbonica, ha contrassegnato un 
momento chiave nella storia americana di scienza. Il record ha 
cominciato in marzo, del 1958 ad un piccolo osservatorio sulla parte 
superiore di Mauna Loa dell'Hawai.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έναρξη της "καμπύλης Keeling," μια ιστορία των 
ατμοσφαιρικών επιπέδων διοξειδίου του άνθρακα, χαρακτήρισε μια 
βασική στιγμή στην αμερικανική ιστορία επιστήμης. Το 
αρχείο άρχισε τον Μάρτιο, του 1958 σε ένα μικρό παρατηρητήριο
στην κορυφή Mauna loa της Χαβάης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El inicio de la "curva de Keeling," una historia 
de los niveles atmosféricos del bióxido de carbono, marcó un 
momento dominante en historia americana de la ciencia. El 
expediente comenzó en marcha de 1958 en un observatorio pequeño en 
la tapa de Mauna Loa de Hawaii.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
